overview: Recursion tells the story of Sherwin, an unlikely Best Man. Awkward and accident prone Sherwin looses the ring moments before the ceremony. But, he knows a powerful secret. A secret that allows him to try everything possible (and impossible) to correct his mistake ...again, and again, and again. The trick? Not to not to destroy his universe while he's at it.
tagline: When an accident-prone "best man" loses the wedding ring, he tries everything possible (and impossible) to save the day.
title: Recursion
